mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (userAc, userName, userGender,userPh,userPt,insertTime, updateTime,remarks) VALUES (#{userAc}, #{userName}, #{userGender}, #{userPh},#{userPt},#{insertTime},#{updateTime},#{remarks})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET userAc = #{userAc}, userPw = #{userPw}, userName = #{userName}, userGender = #{userGender}, userPh = #{userPh}, insertTime = #{insertTime}, updateTime = #{updateTime} WHERE userAc = #{userAc}
